net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AE2_extractAction
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Extract an action from the working copy to display to the user
This sets the values for new and old action types in a JSON object suitable for json.toVars()

arg(0) = Working copy of actions in use by the action editor
arg(1) = The name of the action to extract

Returns a json object with data needed to edit that action
  {
    "exps" : The array of roll expresions that define the action
    "newActionType": The action type of the action
    "oldActionType": The action type of the action with DnD Beyond action type data appended for the action
  }
If the action name passed is not contained in the working copy and empty object is returned
